title: Game Crash
body: I've been having my game crash a lot lately, it only happens in champion select, when I go to pick a champion, or change something like my spells or mastery's. I'm just wondering if it's happening to anyone else or if this is just a problem on my end that I need to look into.

replies.body: If that keeps happening in champ select when you try changing your masteries then it might mean some of the game files have been damaged. Try running a quick repair through the client options, test it in a practice/custom game, and let me know if that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FegZl6UE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-24T02:24:18.423+0000)
>
> If that keeps happening in champ select when you try changing your masteries then it might mean some of the game files have been damaged. Try running a quick repair through the client options, test it in a practice/custom game, and let me know if that helps!

It doesn't happen every game, only every few games, but I'll do the repair thing, and if the problem happens again I'll post it here. Ty for the tip on how to possibly fix it, and if it works I'll pass the info to my friends, it happens to them sometimes as well.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
